Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial on Time to Hemostasis in Bleeding Trauma Patients

Trial_Design.evidence: This randomised controlled trial analyzed data from the PROPPR trial

Participants.evidence: Participants included patients undergoing emergent procedures within 90 minutes

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates the impact of time to hemostasis on clinical outcomes

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation and allocation concealment methods were not specified

Trial_Registration.evidence: Trial registration and funding details were not provided

Funding.evidence: Trial registration and funding details were not provided
